Method Detail

processAnswer

public java.lang.String processAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
                               throws EmptyQuestionListException
Handles the response given from processing an answer while in the elementary state. Transitions to the standard state if two questions are answered correctly in a row

Specified by:
processAnswer in class QuestionState
Parameters:
answer - the answer to process
Returns:
correct or incorrect and a hint on the first try
Throws:
EmptyQuestionListException - if there are no more questions to process
